DataElement.preferredName: Patient Cognitive Motor Visual Auditory Impairment Unable to Do Use a Computer Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures._Of or being or relating to or involving cognition._In medicine, having to do with the movement of body parts._Relating to or using sight; able to be seen._Of or relating to the process of hearing._Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function._A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something._A question about whether an individual used a computer._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures._Of or being or relating to or involving cognition._In medicine, having to do with the movement of body parts._Relating to or using sight; able to be seen._Of or relating to the process of hearing._Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function._A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something._A question about whether an individual used a computer._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Concepts.definition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Property.preferredName: Cognitive Motor Visual Auditory Impairment Unable to Do Use a Computer Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:In medicine, having to do with the movement of body parts.:Relating to or using sight; able to be seen.:Of or relating to the process of hearing.:Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.:A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.:A question about whether an individual used a computer.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.
In medicine, having to do with the movement of body parts.
Relating to or using sight; able to be seen.
Of or relating to the process of hearing.
Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.
A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.
A question about whether an individual used a computer.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have cognitive,
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have cognitive, motor, visual or auditory impairment that prevents computer use?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have no known significant physical or cognitive impairment that would prevent use of the electronic devices used for the protocol intervention?
